data.text: We’re hiring a Digital Marketing Manager! If you have experience in managing digital cross-channel marketing campaigns and have strong analytical skills - join us now and take your career to new heights: https://t.co/9T2KJdXfvm https://t.co/KEVOdjwrIp

#DidYouKnow that pilots don’t hear applauses during landing roll since they are busy with procedures during rollout, communication with air traffic controller and receiving taxi instructions? 👨‍✈️ https://t.co/jN9BZUaIgc
@IeKaVa Labdien, Ieva! Lūgums precizēt Jūsu lidojuma detaļas (rezervācijas numuru), rakstot mums privāto ziņu. Pārbaudīsim Jūsu gadījumu.

@jussimari Hi! Correct! A negative PCR test result for COVID-19, performed no longer as 72h before the flight, is required. There is not a concretely defined format of how the test result should be presented, however - for your own peace of mind we kindly invite you to have it printed out.

@AivarsTennisUK Please be informed that our flight schedule is subject to daily change. As the pdf format is not interactive, we kindly invite you check the actual schedule on the previously sent interactive destinations map or by filling in the form on the first view of our web page. Thank you.

@AivarsTennisUK Hello! Correct! We are currently not planning to perform direct flights to Almaty and Baku this summer season. You can also see the actual map of our destinations here: https://t.co/4gSOmOD3Df

@OfmaneSabine Labdien! Pēc mūsu rīcībā esošās informācijas, šobrīd PCR tests, kurš veikts ne agrāk kā 72h pirms lidošanas uz Spāniju, joprojām ir nepieciešams. Detalizētākai informācijai par turpmākiem lēmumiem aicinām sazināties ar atbildīgajām valsts institūcijām. Paldies!

Today we are celebrating all cabin crew, who dedicate their lives to the skies! Your superpower to turn travel into a safe and joyful experience is one of the things that makes aviation magical! Happy International Flight Attendant's Day from airBaltic family!💚 https://t.co/3MIAEzQvrV

Thanks for participating! 🤗 This year we will offer 8 destinations in the sunny Italy, including 7 already this summer! 😎 Go check them out on our web page https://t.co/08f7aKHyl4 
Which is the dream one for you?

data.text: @sintijasmite @Sat_Min Labdien! Lūdzam skatīt mūsu atbildi zem Jūsu Facebook ieraksta! Paldies!
@ina_ukstina Labdien! Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par Jūsu dāvanu karti, pārbaudīsim! Paldies!

For our latest article, we talked with our technician Yurii Miklush to find out about the duties and job specifics of an avionics technician here at @airBaltic, why he moved to Latvia all the way from Ukraine, and why he is so proud of this profession: https://t.co/HMrUNloURM https://t.co/wNeME9Np9B
👋The rain has passed, the sun is out and we are ready for the weekend! Are you? https://t.co/owNR805Ugb
#airBalticQuiz is knocking on your door so is the active summer! ☀️ This time we are wondering do you know how many destinations we will have in Italy this year? 🇮🇹

@elvee2017 Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Informējam, ka Māmiņdienas akcijas kodu varēja izmantot š. g. 8. un 9. maijā. 31. oktobris šajā gadījumā norādīts kā iespējamais vēlākais lidojumu datums. Ņemot vērā, ka akcija ir jau noslēgusies, diemžēl konkrētās akcijas lapu apmeklēt nav iespējams.

There is no place for inequality! We stand for a united and accepting attitude everywhere. Only by embracing diversity, we grow as a company and as a society. Take a look at our sustainability page to find out how #diverse we are: https://t.co/wkC3YtjPhE #EuropeanDiversityMonth https://t.co/NO2J90BK3h

#DidYouKnow that this week we recognized the Aviation Maintenance Technician Day? Those are professionals who keep aviation safe and possible every day. They inspect, maintain and repair the aircraft, so it can function smoothly and be safe for passengers and crew. https://t.co/r9XQdmEkTR
airBaltic suspends flights from Riga to Minsk. More details: https://t.co/2O0dD4CeHt https://t.co/W8vpFoaMdm

airBaltic par lidojumiem virs Baltkrievijas gaisa telpas: https://t.co/M29hmTGYEp
airBaltic on flights over Belarus’ airspace: https://t.co/Ncd3CAABQt

data.text: On your next visit to Riga, complement your trip with a tour of Cēsis. It’s a true gem to discover and we’re proud to feature it as the second #NFT in our #cryptoart collection! Read our blog for more ideas for your trip to Cēsis: https://t.co/UwdOu94Dhg https://t.co/s3tSY5uesA

We've welcomed spring in full bloom! 

Photo by 📷 Kristīne Limare https://t.co/ViyFYJgYgz

#DidYouKnow that it's not always the Captain flying the aircraft? During the pre-flight stage both pilots decide who is going to be flying which sector. Normally, on a 4 sector day it's gonna be a 50/50 split. https://t.co/sH66eUrxFk

It's heart-warming to reunite with our beloved staff. We have started a re-hiring process and will welcome back 20 former cabin crew. We are happy to see the demand for travel and human connections rising as it lets us to reconnect with our team again. https://t.co/P3TiAnBq3b https://t.co/jiZgtaAQjc
@bajars Sveiciens! Lieliska doma - nodosim mūsu komandai un izskatīsim šādu iespēju!

Our biggest flight sale of this year is here! Our green tails are ready to fly you to over 60 destinations for very friendly prices. Choose your travel destination now: https://t.co/dXnUN0Ebal https://t.co/rmtttzhOIK
In this journey called life, family is forever. It’s where life begins and love never ends. Happy #InternationalDayOfFamilies! https://t.co/wWzL4el0Di

data.text: Dear passengers, we are approaching summer! Book your sunny getaway to our new and enchanting destinations - Valencia in Spain, Pisa in Italy, and Kos in Greece. Book now for prices as low as 75€ for a roundtrip and travel from July 2021! https://t.co/9tIwzehEKt https://t.co/glQn2bOyNY

If you love to process & analyze a high volume of data, have experience working with HR databases, and are open to new challenges every day, @airBaltic might be the place for you! Apply here: https://t.co/TOsRlYeqoU https://t.co/JCaIpxvRaV

#DidYouKnow that there's a difference between leasing conditions in the aviation?
Wet-lease is any leasing arrangement whereby a company agrees to provide an aircraft and at least one pilot to another company, however dry-lease refers to leasing only the aircraft. https://t.co/fwHAT1vmhP

data.text:
🇱🇻 Svinot Latvijas Republikas Neatkarības atjaunošanas dienu, esam patiesi lepni, ka šo skaisto zemi varam saukt par savām mājām. Saules mūžu Latvijai! 
📷 autors Edgars Trankalis https://t.co/RvhhJ70GCt

🇱🇻 Our spirits fly high today as we celebrate the Day of the Restoration of Independence of the Republic of Latvia. Let us take a moment to appreciate how fortunate we are to call this magnificent land our home. 📷 by Edgars Trankalis. https://t.co/5nezpil5jl
@sr71blackbirdz @Airbus Hi! Yes of course - it is the registration for this aircraft - AAZ. 😊

@Sarma_Freiberga Labdien, Sarma! Informējam, ka var būt situācija, kad 2 biļetes par norādīto akcijas cenu konkrētajā maršrutā un reisā, kā arī izvēlētajā biļešu klasē vairs nav pieejamas. Tādā gadījumā tiek piedāvāta iespēja iegādāties biļetes jau par nākamo pieejamo cenu. Paldies!

@BenjaminClaar @Airbus Hello! Thanks for the interesting question. Currently we don't have such details available however we kindly invite you to check those skies from time to time as AAZ may be up there soon! ✈️

data.text: As of April 24th, no self-isolation will be required for passengers arriving to Latvia directly from the UK and Iceland. We are still recommending all our passengers to travel for essential reasons only. Find travel information related to Covid-19 here: https://t.co/u4OySMQEYL https://t.co/SLywvdjCWZ

@PassedToMessi Unfortunately we won't be able to provide an answer on such specific question. We kindly invite you to contact Georgian authorities for more details in regards to the specific entry requirements. Some information is also available here: https://t.co/wdHZ5yiM8s
@PassedToMessi Hello! Yes, this will be transit in Riga (if flying with us).
It’s another Friday – which means it’s #airBalticQuiz time! Have you heard of such activity as “Aircraft spotting”? 🤔 Can you guess what does that mean and stand for?

Our growth continues! We have signed a land reservation agreement with @riga_airport for building a new Baltic Cargo Hub. It will be the largest air cargo handling facility in the Baltics, enabling us to handle more than 30 000 tonnes of cargo each year. https://t.co/aKEMT9NQXE https://t.co/ATssFb7ZpW
@Milnoc @Airbus Serious issue! https://t.co/vGLRwZtYE8

We are glad to announce a new baggage allowance for our passengers as of today! Feel free to take advantage of 23kg checked baggage with GREEN Classic and GREEN Plus reservations free of charge: https://t.co/3th4ud0GHQ https://t.co/wgd75YzyUj

data.text: #DidYouKnow that our @Airbus A220 is directly communicating with airline’s technical department and sending different kind of data about the aircraft and flight? This gives an excellent overview on how the aircraft is doing and when it comes to upcoming service and repair works! https://t.co/VbdK84I3BQ

Iespēja ceļot sportistiem nav mirkļa iegriba, bet gan viņu karjeras jautājums. Mēs runājām ar kalnu slēpotāju Lieni Bondari un @lhf_lv sporta menedžeri Jāni Straupi, lai vēlreiz pārliecinātos, cik daudz sportistiem nozīmē tas, ka esam #SavienotiArPasauli https://t.co/gXiRZ8wMJz https://t.co/3mHt40eAXV

data.text: For athletes, the chance to travel in these times is not a whim, but a question of their career. We talked with alpine skier Liene Bondare and Jānis Straupe from @lhf_lv to find out why #ConnectivityIsEssential in professional sports. https://t.co/9EQyMKWROu https://t.co/nvGyEUxeT2
@theo_lcrx Good evening! Who knows what the future may bring? 😎 Follow our social media channels as well as subscribe to our newsletter for the latest news on this: https://t.co/VqWp2NbjwK

We are happy to offer essential connectivity between the Baltics and the world! In April we fly to 33 destinations - daily flights to Amsterdam, weekly flights to Nordic capitals, Paris, London and Frankfurt and more flights to Southern Europe: https://t.co/yaA2j2mVNK https://t.co/YFnnlbAEHI

Savienojam uzvarai! 🏒 Šodien mums bija gods uzņemt Latvijas hokeja izlasi valsts karoga YL-CSL gaisa kuģī, lai pavadītu ceļā uz Pasaules čempionāta pārbaudes spēlēm Slovākijā. Turam īkšķus un jūtam līdzi! https://t.co/v2PU8ki3Wf
